dct_title_s: Noua Delineatio Geographica generalis Apostolicarum peregrinationum S FRANCISCI XAUERII Indiarum & Iaponiæ Apostoli in EVROPA, AFRICA, ASIA & in Mari AMERICÆ [:] Nieuwe generaele Verbeeldinghe van de Apostelÿcke pelgrimagien vanden H FRANCISCVS XAVERIVS Apostel van Indien ende Iaponien in EVROPA, AFRICA, ASIA, ende ter Zee in AMERICA
dct_description_sm: Map centers on Eastern Hemisphere and includes Longitudes between 330 deg. West and 230 deg. East and Latitudes between 60 deg North and South, thus excluding most of North and South America. California as large island with rounded northern coastline at map top right. California labelled, but without other placenames.

Issued in: [?] Leven, apostolycke deughden gheduerighe mirakelen ende glorie vanden H. Franciscvs Xaverivs vande societyt Jesu, grooten apostel van Indien ende Iaponien, seer wonderbaer in syn leven, ende naer syne doodt naementlyck, in het verwecken van tweeenvyftigh dooden ... Door P. Philippvs Franciscvs Tais[?]e, Priester der Societeyt Jesv. -- ‘r Antwerpen : By Michiel Cnobbaert, in S. Peeter, 1663. Reissued in Mechelin and Brussels, 1663.
Shows sea route “Reÿswech van den H Xauerius” between Lisbona and Asia.
Engraver: Fred Bouttats fe (bottom, to left of cartouche).

Title cartouche of rectangle with 2 standing American natives holding spear and bow on its left, and 2 Asian natives on its right holding rifle and bow and arrow. Both Latin and Dutch title given within cartouche (bottom right).
